extends java.lang.Object

      • renameNode

        public static void renameNode(java.lang.String newId,
                              ModelNode node)
                       throws LabelException
        Rename an already registered node. If successful, node will have newId set as it's identifier.
        Parameters:
        newId - new node identifier
        node - registered ModelNode instance
        Throws:
        LabelException - thrown when an instance with newId already exists

      • purge

        Clear registry.

      • getNextNodeId

        public static int getNextNodeId()
        Returns next node id. An instance could have already been MANUALLY registered with returned id.
        Returns:
        node id
